basic-info.name: Dr. Vu Huy
basic-info.title: AI Researcher & Specialist
basic-info.bio: I'm a passionate AI researcher and engineer with over 6 years of experience in machine learning, data science, and artificial intelligence. I specialize in developing cutting-edge AI solutions that solve real-world problems.

about.mission: At VUHUY AI, we're dedicated to pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence through innovative research and practical applications. Our mission is to develop AI solutions that address real-world challenges and make advanced technology accessible to everyone.

values.name: Innovation
values.description: Constantly exploring new ideas and approaches to solve complex problems.

values.name: Collaboration
values.description: Working together with researchers, developers, and organizations to achieve greater impact.

values.name: Accessibility
values.description: Making AI technologies and knowledge available to diverse communities worldwide.

team.name: Dr. Vu Huy
team.bio: Expert in NLP and machine learning with over 10 years of research experience.

team.name: Dr. Jane Smith
team.bio: Specializes in deep learning architectures and their applications in computer vision.

team.name: Dr. Michael Johnson
team.bio: Focuses on reinforcement learning and multi-agent systems.
